implicitPoint3D_LPI(p1:l1x;4;1024;1.221613955826318e-14;12.00000000000002;l1y;4;1024;1.221613955826318e-14;12.00000000000002;l1z;4;1024;1.221613955826318e-14;12.00000000000002;d1;3;192;4.886390771174922e-015;6.000000000000006)

pbx pby pbz
pcx pcy pcz
pdx pdy pdz
pex pey pez

pexd = pex * d1
peyd = pey * d1
pezd = pez * d1
aex = l1x - pexd
aey = l1y - peyd
aez = l1z - pezd

bex = pbx - pex
bey = pby - pey
bez = pbz - pez
cex = pcx - pex
cey = pcy - pey
cez = pcz - pez
dex = pdx - pex
dey = pdy - pey
dez = pdz - pez

aexbey = aex * bey
bexaey = bex * aey
ab = aexbey - bexaey
bexcey = bex * cey
cexbey = cex * bey
bc = bexcey - cexbey
cexdey = cex * dey
dexcey = dex * cey
cd = cexdey - dexcey
dexaey = dex * aey
aexdey = aex * dey
da = dexaey - aexdey
aexcey = aex * cey
cexaey = cex * aey
ac = aexcey - cexaey
bexdey = bex * dey
dexbey = dex * bey
bd = bexdey - dexbey

abc1 = aez * bc
abc2 = bez * ac
abc3 = cez * ab
abc4 = abc1 + abc3
abc = abc4 - abc2

bcd1 = bez * cd
bcd2 = cez * bd
bcd3 = dez * bc
bcd4 = bcd1 + bcd3
bcd = bcd4 - bcd2

cda1 = cez * da
cda2 = dez * ac
cda3 = aez * cd
cda4 = cda1 + cda3
cda = cda4 + cda2

dab1 = dez * ab
dab2 = aez * bd
dab3 = bez * da
dab4 = dab1 + dab3
dab = dab4 + dab2

al1 = aex * aex
al2 = aey * aey
al3 = aez * aez
al4 = al1 + al2
alift = al4 + al3

bl1 = bex * bex
bl2 = bey * bey
bl3 = bez * bez
bl4 = bl1 + bl2
blift = bl4 + bl3

cl1 = cex * cex
cl2 = cey * cey
cl3 = cez * cez
cl4 = cl1 + cl2
clift = cl4 + cl3

dl1 = dex * dex
dl2 = dey * dey
dl3 = dez * dez
dl4 = dl1 + dl2
dlift = dl4 + dl3

ds1 = dlift * abc
ds2 = clift * dab
dlp = ds2 - ds1
dl = dlp * d1

dr1p = blift * cda
dr1 = dr1p * d1
dr2 = alift * bcd
dr = dr2 - dr1

det = dl + dr
